Level Class

class Level

A class representing a game level.

name

The name of the level.

slug

The unique identifier (slug) of the level.

song

The background music for the level.

laps

The number of laps in the level.

backgrounds

List of background images for the level.

palettes

The color palettes for the level.

finished

A boolean indicating whether the level is finished.

segments

List of game segments in the level.

competitors

List of competitor objects in the level.

__init__(details)

Initializes a Level.

Parameters:

details – Details about the level.

build()

Builds the level by reading track and sprite information.

add_segment(curve, start_y=0, end_y=0)

Adds a game segment to the level.

Parameters:

  • curve – The curvature of the segment.

  • start_y – The starting y-coordinate of the segment.

  • end_y – The ending y-coordinate of the segment.

add_sprite(segment, name, x, y=0.0)

Adds a sprite to a specific game segment.

Parameters:

  • segment – The game segment to which the sprite is added.

  • name – The name of the sprite.

  • x – The x-coordinate of the sprite.

  • y – The y-coordinate of the sprite.

add_polygon(segment, klass, when='pre', args=[])

Adds a polygon to a game segment.

Parameters:

  • segment – The game segment to which the polygon is added.

  • klass – The class of the polygon.

  • when – The timing of the polygon (either “pre” or “post”).

  • args – Additional arguments for the polygon.

insert_bonuses()

Inserts bonus sprites into random segments of the level.

add_speed_boost(position, offset)

Adds speed boost sprites to the level.

Parameters:

  • position – The position of the speed boost.

  • offset – The offset of the speed boost.

add_competitor(position, offset, name, speed)

Adds a competitor to the level.

Parameters:

  • position – The position of the competitor.

  • offset – The offset of the competitor.

  • name – The name of the competitor.

  • speed – The speed of the competitor.

add_tunnel(start, end)

Adds a tunnel to the level.

Parameters:

  • start – The starting index of the tunnel.

  • end – The ending index of the tunnel.

track_length()

Calculates the total length of the track.

find_segment(position)

Finds the game segment at a given position.

Parameters:

position – The position to find the segment for.

offset_segment(i)

Returns the game segment at the specified offset.
